reviewText:
I'm wondering where all these people who claim to have watched this movie were when it was showing.
After more than 30 minutes I finally got fed up with it.  That's NOT because it's in a Russian-like language and Spanish because I can understand some of the former and a lot of the latter.  This just did not have anything in it to hold my interest.
Great story line.  Most of movie in subtitles.
Great movie.  A strange mix of Russian and Spanish and a strange mix of humor and tragedy.

This is such a wonderful action and original story movie.  Definitely a must see.

This movie has english subtitles.

I watched this on HBO on demand (even though I never heard of it).
Very well done drama, with humor and romance.
